dashboard.label: Zimbra Control Room

thread_name=* action=Deleting* folder_id=* | eval nfolder=mvcount(folder_id) | timechart span=1m limit=top5 sum(nfolder) by authz_name","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m@m","latest":"@m"},"refreshType":"delay","refresh":"1m"},"name":"folder purge"},"ds_AIW4wMeb_ds_search_1":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"[search sourcetype=\"zimbra:postfix\" postfix_process=* client\\= internal_message_id=* | fields mta_server internal_message_id] sourcetype=\"zimbra:postfix\" postfix_process=* | transaction maxspan=2s maxevents=3 startswith=(client\\= AND src_ip!=127.0.0.1) endswith=\"(queue active)\" mta_server internal_message_id| timechart span=1m count ","queryParameters":{"earliest":"-15m@m","latest":"@m"},"refreshType":"delay","refresh":"1m"},"name":"mail submitted"},"ds_3hzSeL37":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"sourcetype=\"zimbra:postfix\" postfix_process=* \"queue active\" | timechart span=1m limit=top5 nullstr=\"<>\" count by
